name: Cribbage Game Board
description:
A cribbage board for your phone or tablet. Always available. Easy to travel with. All you need is a deck of cards.

Peg as fast as you can tap!

Track points. Cross the skunk line. Beat your opponent.

- Tap once to add a single point.
- Tap and hold to add 5.
- Swipe right to left if you mess up your count while adding points.
- Shake to start over with a new game.
- Swipe up to see and remove any mistakenly counted points.
